_sText:
Introducing a Bank Robbery

Situation
Thieves (Terrorists) have taken over G.N.B. (Name inspired over Goliath National Bank) and had taken hostages. Negotiations have been futile. We (Counter Terrorist) have secured the perimeter, and no one can escape without us noticing. Your objective is to Rescue the hostages by any means necessary. Our satellite reveals that the robbers are all spread out in corridors as general surveillance, a back alley providing guard from the Back doors, others are located inside the vault taking the money and a few are holding the hostages, so expect heavy fire as soon as you get there.

Game play
It’s a Bank situation, but it’s a slightly different game play than usual CS games. In here Action is instant. All CT start at the entrance with an option to buy weapons, However the Terrorist team are all spread out over bank (Some start in corridors as general surveillance, a back alley providing guard from the Back doors, others are located inside the vault taking the money and a few are holding the hostages). The hostages are just a few feet away, yet its not as simple as rushing in as that ends up in death, so CT have to fight and try to flank using other entrances to the bank.

The inspiration came from having watching a few bank robberies movies, and the fact that I have never played a bank map in here, so it looked like an interesting idea to make. I am very happy with the results

Features
Different spawning points for Terrorist
Hostages are relatively close to rescue zone, yet it still can be quite challenging to still rescue them quickly

Capacity
24 vs. 24

Release 1.01
Updates. More optimized, should run smoother

Release 1.02
Fixed an issue near the vault in which it was possible to see into the ''Nothingness''


Please comment and report bugs etc

If you take this map for your server online DONT FORGET TO PM ME YOUR I.P. address so I CAN JOIN along!

More maps from me to come

Special thanks to 3kliksphilp for his support, guidance, and tutorials at http://3kliksphilip.com/index.html

Look at the screenshots and try it!

Installation, just paste the .nav and .bsp on your maps folder for counter strike source

Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

This map is a tropical island, is has two entrances to the base 1. In the the little hut in middle of the island. 2. The secret underwater entrance. Once your in you will have to go up a lift then though a body scan and a high-tec security system before entering (including lasers) Once your past those in the first room you come to there will be a fireable nucealar rocket :) Go thought this room and you will come to the main room in here you will find: Singing zombies, a huge monitor showing the island, table and kitchen. There is also a tortue chamber and a garage in this base. Becuase of all this cool stuff it may lag a little and shouldn't be attempted with a machine equal or greater than: 2.8GHZ proccessor, 512RAM, ATI RADEON 9200 Update : New Zip file with a smaller size. re-download

Complete remake of the original cs_backalley with an additional twist. 

MAP DETAILS : 

50 total spawn points - 25 vs 25
Two hostage rescue zones - A + B 

custom decals - [drastikat] 
custom models - Zareh (chevyvan) / Shiroko (magic plant)

_________________________________________________________

This version will be the one and only beta, with the final 
release coming around a month later so that I have plenty of 
time work on more custom decals, better optimization, better 
lighting arrangements, and a more enhanced skybox.  IMPORTANT NOTE: Although this is beta, I only say that from an artistic standpoint and not from a playability standpoint.  THIS MAP IS FULLY PLAYABLE - so enjoy this fun, classic, and action-packed ol' school map brought to by [drastikat] 

Thanks to everyone who helped playtest.
Enjoy!

Axe
 Office Assault - Hostage Rescue Scenario

Counter-Terrorists: 
Invade the office complex and resuce the 
hostages being held there. Kill any hostiles.

Terrorists: 
Make haste to guard the hostages within
the office against the incoming offense
of the Counter-Terrorists. Victory must
be achieved at any cost!
 
Notes: 
-There are 4 hostages within 2 
sectors of the building within this map. 
Hostage rescue is at CT Spawn
-Built for 40 players
-See if you can find all weapons in the egg!

This is the updated, hopefully final version of [cs_aurora](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/172440 "cs_aurora"), revised largely due to the fine feedback of USF|Jack. For details on the map, check the above [link](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/172440 "link"). Here are the changes I made:

- added a new route to the hostages.
- added some kind of radar/overview. 
- fixed a few bad player clips.
- added a couple of models.
- fiddled a bit with cubemaps and sprites.

(The screenshots are supposed to show most of the changes.)

While I'm at it, thanks to everyone who commented, rated, downloaded and played the original cs_aurora. Next map is under construction.


LaBello

cs_aurora_2.

This map replaces the previous cs_aurora and cs_aurora_final.

The big difference with this release compared to earlier versions is the performance optimization made by LurkyUK. And even though I kind of thwarted him by adding more detail, a bigger skybox, and hdr, this map should now be quite playable :) 
New in this release is also a fine-tuned NAV-file, made by Meurglis3. 

I hope you like it.

BACKGROUND.

Inspired by Isaac Asimov's novel "The Robots Of Dawn".

On the human colony planet of Aurora, society revolves largely around the use of robots. Certain political forces say further colonization of the galaxy should be handled exclusively by androids, wich is why the Auroran Robotics Institute is now focusing their efforts on creating a humaniform robot - a machine indistinguishable from a human. This accomplishment has however already been achieved, by a robot scientist outside of the institute, who, due to his political views, refuses to share his knowledge with the ARI. This, in combination with a complete lack of progress of their own, may be why the Auroran Robotics Institute has now stolen this unique, humaniform robot. Before the lone scientist has a rescue team assembled, the ARI has managed to duplicate the android twice.

Robot rescue team (CT): Get the humaniform robot and its two clones out of the Institute and back to their engineer.

ARI security (T): Defend the idea of public domain knowledge, and your hostage.

Map by LaBello.


THANKS.

LurkyUK (for overall awesomeness), Lionheart & ukcs.net (in the end perhaps not the perfect 64 player map, but thanks for playing it), Meurglis3 (Hail To The Bots Of Dawn!), USF|Jack (for early development feedback), Gamebanana, Valve.

**NOTE** An updated version of this map is available [here](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/172713 "here"). **NOTE**

BACKGROUND

On the human colony planet of Aurora, society revolves largely around the use of robots. Certain political forces say further colonization of the galaxy should be handled exclusively by androids, wich is why the Auroran Robotics Institute is now focusing their efforts on creating a humaniform robot - a machine indistinguishable from a human. This accomplishment has of course already been achieved, by a robot scientist outside of the institute, who, due to his political views, refuses to share his knowledge with the ARI. This, in combination with a complete lack of progress of their own, may be why the Auroran Robotics Institute has now stolen this unique, humaniform robot. Before the lone scientist has a rescue team assembled, the ARI has now managed to duplicate the android twice.

Robot rescue team (CT): Get the humaniform robot and its two clones out of the Institute and back to their engineer.

Map by LaBello.

FEATURES.

Hostage map set in an earth-like sci-fi environment, combining long range/close quarter combat. 20 spawns. Default .nav file. 
	
NOTES.

My first hostage map. Probably poorly balanced in one way or the other.

THANKS.

Gamebanana, for hosting.
Everyone in the credits list, especially PhilipK, for fantastic textures.
The Last Resort, the pride of Germany.

This map has been based on the SDK version of the "ATP" location in S.T.A.L.K.E.R. game. The map is not a copy or reproduction of the original location, but rather an attempt to make a free-style remix, barely preserving the initial buildings layout. Some models and a few textures were borrowed from the original S.T.A.L.K.E.R. game. Most materials are custom.

This is a 16x16 version of my previous release (https://gamebanana.com/mods/99569). 32 player slots instead of 16. Otherwise the two maps are identical.

This map has been based on the SDK version of the "ATP" location in S.T.A.L.K.E.R. game.

The map is not a copy or reproduction of the original location, but rather an attempt to make a free-style remix, barely preserving the initial buildings layout. 

Some models and a few textures were borrowed from the original S.T.A.L.K.E.R. game. Most materials are custom.

(UPDATE: Fixed a couple things with the .nav file and textures. Upgraded version to Beta 2.)

This is my first effort with the Source engine and Hammer, although I've had lots of past experience with Worldcraft and HL1 mapping. I would like to get feedback on the map before I go from "beta" to "final" status. The following things are not finished yet:

- HUD map image
- Special effects
- Soundscapes and ambient sounds
- Some speed optimization

There are 32 total spawn points in the map, but it seems to play best with 8-16 players. More than that, and the halls start to get clogged with bodies :-D

There's also a small secret area in the map. I salute anyone who discovers how to get inside...

(UPDATE: A lot of people have requested directions or said it was impossible to get into the secret room. I've added a screen shot that shows how.)

Hope ya enjoy!

This is my first well done map. I worked on it a long time, and it was not wasted. On the map you can find swimming pool and a lot of places through which you can get into the house and into the street.
I hope you enjoy.

If you find any bugs or problems realties - write.

Map:cs_atafaris+
mapper:CoKie
spawnpoints:64
releasedate:11.november.2007

description:inspired by de_dust, de_prodigy and myself.

terrorists: two hostages you keep imprisoned in the sternmost corner of the old desert stronghold. for some reason keep it yours!

counter-terrorists: infiltrate the old desert stronghold and rescue the two hostages!


have fun! 
CoKie

--------------------------------------
changes since cs_atafaris
--------------------------------------

the trigger to create a "plus-version" of cs_atafaris was that ive unfortunately forgotten to compile the cubemaps for LDR, concentrated all the time on HDR; so ive only generated the cubemaps for HDR, not for LDR in cs_atafaris.. mistakes/slips like that are really annoying..

whats new/changed?
- edited HDR in the whole map, HDR effect is now more intensive but less bedazzling
- edited and optimized the lightning in the lower server room
- several minor changes of optical nature
- generated cubemaps for HDR AND LDR..
- edited the general enviroment lightning, more smooth now less bedazzling
- added some smoothing groups

- credits go out to chizbone; he created, optimized and placepainted the navigationmesh/navfile, great job!

Terrorists: A terrorist faction heard the horrors of the asylum. Just days earlier their fellow Allah worshipper was sent there because he pleaded for insanity in court. They intend to get him out of there so he won't hog all the virgins if he'd die.

Counter-Terrorists: The CTs must rescue the staff! Reports are that 4 staff members were captured.. the rest got slaughtered or managed to escape. They need to get them out of harms way for interrogation to know what exactly went on in that place!

They won't like being rescued by cops... so they might not do what we want them all the time, but we can't let that get us down.

My first Map.

Hostage Situation in Desert Metropolis. Nice Gameplay, mostly final ;)
I'd say: The BEST Map of this time, but I dont want to overscale your expectations, see for yourself. :)

Newest Version, with far less bugs. Quite similar to assust_fff, but much Brighter, better Bot nav_mesh, Textures, music, arches thicker, etc.
Tell me your Opinion.

cs_assault_zt
_____________
by zeta

_________________

Introduction
_________________

This is the final release of my remake of assault, with
the previous version being an incomplete rushed piece of 
rubbish. I really hope this tides everyone over untill 
valve get around to recreating it themselves.


There are a couple of easter eggs hidden in the map. See
how long it takes you to find them ;) 

(hint : noclip might be usefull)

Have fun!

_________________



Installation
_________________



Simply extract all files in the zip too:


C:\Steam\SteamApps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike


And you're done.


_________________




Huge thanks to the following:
-----------------------------


Kabuki - Optimizing GOD & TMP whore
Joeyslucky - Amazing custom decals
Dura - Compadre
Feedbag - For an amazing site 




_________________
Visit www.hl2world.com for an amazing community, mapping help & tutorials,
along with all the custom source content you'll ever need!

Cs_assault_wood_beta - CS Assault in a wood fort setting

By Aaron Ankiel AKA Lugz 
(thefoobagger AT gmail.com)
maps at www.bloodsportgaming.com/maps/lugz/

This map is based on the classic assault with many different things that no other assaults have. This map has many ways to get inside and out of the main assault building. It also has things like a big sniper area. It also has an underground tunnel like some other assault maps. It has a wood theme hence the name assault wood and it doesn't have hosties yet but they will be coming in the final release.

Classic CS_Assault map...
CTs - Rescue Hostages, or guard the fort!!!
Ts - Guard Hostages, or go outside and protect the fort!!!

cs_assault_v2 is the 2nd version made, you will see some changes when you test them yourselves.

added placenames

Laundery Assault - Hostage Rescue

The Marr Freight Company has fallen 
victim to a band of Terrorists hell bent 
on using their operation to launder money.
The Harper Appliance Company is
unwittingly shipping out more than they
bargained for.
 
Counter-Terrorists: Enter the Terrorist
stronghold and rescue the hostages. 
Take out the Terrorists without 
jeopardizing the hostages.

Terrorists: Prevent Counter-Terrorist
force from rescuing the hostages. 
 
Other Notes: There are 4 hostages in 
this mission.

Credits:
Source Version by Valve
Original Version by CryptR

This is a little improvement from my last map, cs_assault_gadget. It's supposed to run smoother, and there are some other visual improvements. The idea of this map is to keep the style true to the original cs_assault. Some might think that I should have used more of what Source can offer, but I didn't bother with this map. That would have changed the gameplay of the map.

cs_assault   revolution


Built from scratch, tried to keep the original feel


Th3Grind3R
original map by CryptR

CS_Assault_Ren:
	
Remake of the original assault for CS.




INSTALLATION:
Extract this .zip into:

"C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\"Source E-mail\counter-strike source\cstrike\"

It will ask you to overwrite some files, just say yes to all, it only says that cause of the 
folder that are being extracted.




MAP INFO:

Build Time:
'bout 3 days from start to finish


Compile time:
13 minutes or so


Textures:
All HL2 Textures


Models:
All HL2 Models


Bugs:
It is possible for the player to jump off the warehouse and get outside of the level.
This isn't a big deal as it isn't an advantage to the player.  It would have been fixed
but i've having some problems opening the map in Source, so i though i'd just release what
i have done so far, which is very playable, and is almost what i had in mind for the
final version.

Also, the players show up as pure black when outside in only the sunlight, this is
due to the problem that the sun doesn't cast light on players for some reason.  It's ok
though, doesnt' detract from gameplay.  my final version has tons of little lights outside
but, since i can't open it in source i can't get it uploaded.




Credits:

Mapping - Renegade
Testing - Renegade
	- DarkMauler


This map can be be redistributed, but only if this file is attached. Thank
